Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker w is assigned to team t, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable: 1 if user story us is assigned to sprint sp, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_feature_to_release
Description: Binary variable: 1 if feature f is assigned to release plan rp, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary variable: 1 if task tsk is assigned to worker w, 0 otherwise.

Name: select_project_for_portfolio
Description: Binary variable: 1 if project p is selected to be worked on, 0 otherwise.

Name: sprint_start_date
Description: The start date for a given sprint.

Name: sprint_end_date
Description: The end date for a given sprint.

Name: worker_availability_percentage
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available for the project.

Name: feature_priority_level
Description: An integer value representing the priority of a feature.

Name: task_effort_hours
Description: The estimated effort in hours for a task.

Name: budget_allocation_per_project
Description: The amount of budget allocated to a specific project.

Name: select_worker_for_task_with_skill
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker w with skill s is assigned to task tsk, 0 otherwise.
